name: Legends of Snooker: One Shot
description:
Plays That Appear to Be Impossible

Find the Perfect Angle



Legend of snooker will leave you instigated to give the 8 ball its end

Featuring:

  • Classic snooker look but will challenge you.
  • The game has 100 different levels.
  • The more you evolve, the game will become more difficult.
  • If you don't get it right away, you can look the last move marker.
  • Original Composed Soundtracks.
  • You only have one shot to hit the 8 ball, and you cannot hit the other balls in the hole.
